scripts.update: yarn install | less && sudo apt-get update | less && npm i | less
scripts.apkg: read -p "Yarn, NPM (default), or Sudo? [y/n/s] " answer && read -p "Name of package: " package && if [ "$answer" = "y" ] || [ "$answer" = "Y" ]; then yarn install $package; elif [ "$answer" = "s" ] || [ "$answer" = "S" ]; then sudo apt-get install $package; else npm i $package; fi && echo Done!
scripts.rmpkg: read -p "Yarn, NPM (default), or Sudo? [y/n/s] " answer && read -p "Name of package: " package && if [ "$answer" = "y" ] || [ "$answer" = "Y" ]; then yarn remove $package; elif [ "$answer" = "s" ] || [ "$answer" = "S" ]; then sudo apt remove $package; else npm uninstall $package; fi && echo Done!
